com.innerspec.main

Class SplashScreenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.innerspec.main.SplashScreenManager

  • public class SplashScreenManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the display of text to the splash screen.

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        private static java.lang.String getToken(java.lang.String propToken)
        Returns the version number of the build. Version number is handled in build.xml with the -pre-jar target and output to the version.property file in the resource package. Version number is currently incremented by one every time it is built.
        Parameters:
        propToken - The token of the property to be read from com.innerspec.resources.version. This program expects the value to be "BUILD".
        Returns:
        Minor version number (ex: 1 in 2.0.1)

      • splashInit

        public static void splashInit()
        Prepare the global variables for the other splash functions.

      • splashText

        private static void splashText(java.lang.String str,
                               int x,
                               int y)
        Displays a string at a location on the splash screen.
        Parameters:
        str - String to be displayed.
        x - X coordinate of the text.
        y - Y coordinate of the text.

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns the version string with a leading v. This is output directly to the splash screen.
        Returns:
        String with version information.
